document.full_text: a canadian baby on the brink of death was being evaluated by doctors in st. louis on tuesday after he was refused treatment in ontario and airlifted to the u.s., officials said on tuesday.
document.title: terminally ill canadian baby in missouri hospital
lines_and_colors: a canadian baby on the brink of death was being evaluated by doctors in st. louis on tuesday after he was refused treatment in ontario and airlifted to the u.s., officials said on tuesday.
